results.title: The Great Australian cultural exchange programme
results.brief_description: A humourous hand-drawn 2D computer animation of newly arrived Chinese immigrants being chased through the landscape by a ‘banana in pyjamas’, B0, as opposed to B1 and B2 of the ABC childrens program Bananas in Pyjamas.

results.title: Essence of Terror
results.brief_description: An inquisitive young boy explores the contents of the medicine cabinet and is tempted into trying the jar labelled ‘Adol Essence’… He is plunged into a world of terror as his body starts to change in alarming new ways.

results.title: Octikuki
results.brief_description: Octikuki uses 2D and 3D computer animation to create a futuristic creation scene. The animation plays with themes nature and science reading as a visual poem. The music soundtrack ‘Sweet Thunder’ is by Yello.

results.title: The Albatross
results.brief_description: This claymation tells the story of a lone desert dweller. The ‘humanoid’ animal one day comes across an injured albatross and sets about to nurture the bird back to health. Later in her explorations of the day she comes across a caged and abandoned male counterpart and proceeds to help him also. On contact with the male she telepathically sees the mans troubled past (the cause of his present condition) and responds with empathy and friendship.

results.title: Washing machine circa 1522
results.brief_description: A hand-drawn animation on paper in sepia tone in response to the theme washing machine and metamorphosis. Martin Luther (1483-1546) is a monk but also religious reformer and inventor. As he is working hard on an invention when he is attacked by a ‘Japanese’ insect. The affected monk slips into various states of metamorphosis whilst wrestling with inventing the washing machine. A tool of the Devil.

results.title: Flare
results.brief_description: Using a mixture of 2D computer animation styles influenced my Manga films, Flare is surreal with images of insects seen through the microscrope, metaphorically illustrating the obsessions and world of a dedicated scientist. The scientist is confronted by his daughter who insists he talk with her about family issues of the past. The father ignores his daughters request and chooses to bury himself in his work.

results.title: Twinkle twinkle
results.brief_description: A colour hand-drawn animation in response to the theme washing machine depicts the story of a little girl Emily in the home of arguing parents. She reads, plays and sings in a make-shift cubby house - a box that held the new washing machine - and lives a fantasy life to escape her arguing parents.

results.title: An afternoon with...
results.brief_description: This humourous cut-out animation of two friends Ana and Roxi having afternoon tea, gives new meaning to the words “Have a waifer with your tea”, when one woman is offered a waif instead. Co-created by Jeong Kyu Kim and Sophie Raymond.
